Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Chimera Tank
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Astra Militarum Chimera in Warhammer 40,000 is a vital armored vehicle for the Imperial Guard, with a durable chassis and armed with weaponry like the multi-laser. It acts as both a troop transport and fire support, swiftly moving infantry squads while engaging enemy targets. Adorned with Imperial symbols, it embodies the grim aesthetic of Warhammer 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x12
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
